name: Intergalactic Rescue
description:
In this 2D platformer intergalactic rescuer should as fast as possible to pass through space ship of interplanetary scientists and collect ion-quantum batteries.

  • Challenging gameplay that can easy bring you into flow state.
  • 30 unique levels.
  • Timers to detecting your speed on levels.
  • Simple timer if you don't collect 3 battery. Gold timer if you collect all 3 battery on level.
  • Various game mechanics.
  • Enemies alien beasts.
  • Dynamic atmospheric soundtracks.
  • Complete the levels more quickly than others and get to the top of the best.
  • A lot of electricity...


"Received a distress signal from the ship interplanetary scientists. It is not known what they were carrying in their board and what happened. What is known is that immediately after the distress signal was lost contact with them. The engine is off and the ship rapidly attracted to the star. You intergalactic rescuer. Your task is as soon as possible enable the engines. Thereby saving the scientists, ship and everything in it. Hurry, the quicker run through the levels the better."
